definitions.title: terr.
definitions.body: conquered by Assyria (prob. = iv. [[עֵדֶן]]; pointed [[עֶדֶן]] to differentiate from III. ´[[ע]], cf. WMM:As. u. Eur. 291);—´[[בְּנֵי־ע]] 2Ki 19:12 (LXX ui(ou\v )/Edem) = Is 37:12 (in Telassau), ´[[ע]] alone Ez Eze 27:23 (+ [[חָרָן וְכַנֶּה]]); prob. = (Bit-)Adini of Middle Euphrates Schr:COT 2 K 19, 12 Dl:Pa 263 f. —
